comments.body:
Having two consecutive separators in the middle seems interesting too.
```suggestion
  T.unstableSplitOn " " "  foo bar baz  " === [ "", "", "foo", "bar", "baz", "", "" ]
  T.unstableSplitOn " " "foo  bar" === [ "foo", "", "bar" ]
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@  T.unstableSplitOn " " " "               === [ "", "" ]
  T.unstableSplitOn " " "foo bar baz"     === [ "foo", "bar", "baz" ]
  T.unstableSplitOn " " "  foo bar baz  " === [ "", "", "foo", "bar", "baz", "", "" ]
  T.unstableSplitOn " " "foo  bar" === [ "foo", "", "bar" ]
  T.unstableSplitOn "." "4"               === [ "4" ]
